title: Terraform
pageDescription: Cloud Containers from VK Cloud Solutions - Kubernetes as a cloud service.The service has CNCF certification and is compatible with the standard Kubernetes API.Thanks to automatic scaling (autoScaling), applications on Cloud Containers instantly receive additional power at the time of peak loads and reduce consumption when it falls.Automatic system allows you to save up to 60% on calculations.
shortDescription: Automatic scaling of services and applications at loads on the basis of Docker and Kubernetes

markdown: Cloud Containers from VK Cloud Solutions - Kubernetes as a cloud service.The service has CNCF certification and is compatible with the standard Kubernetes API.Thanks to automatic scaling (autoScaling), applications on Cloud Containers instantly receive additional power at the time of peak loads and reduce consumption when it falls.Automatic system allows you to save up to 60% on calculations.
